results.title: Forgotten corner
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Samara McIlroy and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘A little further up the road and a little further into the wilderness than you think.’ Samara McIlroy pays loving tribute to her special corner of Victoria, a place where you can still drop in for a ‘cuppa’ without ringing first.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Samara McIlroy and ACMI

results.title: Whatever happened to La Pérouse?
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Peter Kiernan and ACMI
results.brief_description: In addition to being a cherished family home, La Pérouse in Heidelberg, Victoria, is a historic building with a rich history, full of opera singers, vaudeville stars, and driving lessons.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Peter Kiernan and ACMI

results.title: Bunga our haven
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Pam Enting and ACMI
results.brief_description: Pam Enting and some 19 other families are part owners of what they call ‘Bunga Haven’. She tells the story of how this arrangement came to be, and of the environmental battles that were undertaken to save the lake.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Pam Enting and ACMI

results.title: Our Matt
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Noel Withers and ACMI
results.brief_description: Noel Withers is very proud of his son Matt. Born with Crouzon Syndrome, Matt suffered hearing loss, facial abnomalities and had to undergo numerous procedures to accommodate brain growth. Some operations were more successful than others, but Matt faced them all with a determination that inspired admiration in those around him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Noel Withers and ACMI
results.description: Noel Withers is very proud of his son Matt. Born with Crouzon Syndrome, Matt suffered hearing loss, facial abnomalities and had to undergo numerous procedures to accommodate brain growth. Some operations were more successful than others, but Matt faced them all with a determination that inspired admiration in those around him.

Some operations were more successful than others, but Matt faced them all with a determination that inspired admiration in those around him.

results.title: The Travelling divorcees
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Michelle Rayner and ACMI
results.brief_description: Michelle Rayner reflects on the evolution of the marriage between Patricia and Michael, her parents. Throughout the years they have gone through many changes both personally and as a couple, and often reflecting the times.

results.title: Getting off map 30
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Anna Poletti and ACMI
results.brief_description: For the fourteen years that Anna Poletti has lived in Melbourne, her various residences have had one thing in common - you can locate them all on map 30 of the Melways street directory. She pays homage to the streets and intersections of her neighbourhood.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Anna Poletti and ACMI

results.title: Welcome to my nightmare
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Zoero Theoharou and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zoero Theoharou delves back into a time when she felt lost, trapped in a cold nightmare of misery from which she couldn’t wake. The only release from this nightmare was through pain.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Zoero Theoharou and ACMI

results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Zenebech Tebeje and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Zenebech Tebeje and ACMI
